TrainingDetailsVTwo.Name: HTML Copy
TrainingDetailsVTwo.Title: HTML Copy Element
TrainingDetailsVTwo.Abstract: A text area that accepts HTML code, and provides a WYSIWYG editor by default.
TrainingDetailsVTwo.BodyCopy:
The HTML Copy area (aka. Intro, Body Copy, Main Message, Optional Content, Welcome Copy, Event Details, Policy; see also Form Elements) is the primary area for your content. This is the place for most images, text, embeded movies, and much more.

Proper Use

The HTML Copy area provides a HTML editor by default. If necessary, you can switch to code view and edit HTML directly. The editor will validate the HTML and scrub out any invalid HTML tags, so be sure to save and preview your changes regularly!
